name: Town of idiots
description:
Online version of the party game, mafia, with a twist.
Join a lobby with random people. Then when you're ready, type /start.

You'll be given a role from one of the alignments, each alignment competes to complete their goal.

How to play:
The players are divided into alignments:
Town:
Use your abilities and deduction skills to find and kill the evils before its too late.

Mafia:
Blend in with the town in the day but come night time, kill them in their sleep.

Neutraul:
Complete your own goal regardless of what damage you may do.
